metatags.title: 'We just don't want people to think this is over': Florence continues ravaging the Carolinas as the death toll climbs, rivers overflow, and tornadoes threaten to strike
metatags.og:description: As Hurricane Florence tears through the Carolinas, the danger associated with heavy rainfall and storm surge flooding continue to rise. The storm has killed a reported 17 so far, and officials expect the death toll to rise.
